title: Data Scientist and Artificial Intelligence Expert
description: I am a Data Scientist and Artificial Intelligence Expert at the Institute of Theoretical and Applied Artificial Intelligence (IATAI) of the Spanish National Research Council (CSIC). I am also a member of the Spanish Association for Artificial Intelligence (AEPIA) and the Spanish Society of Statistics and Operations Research (SEIO).
